name: Quick and Easy Chocolate Pie
author: Reddi-wip
summary: A dessert pie recipe with a filling of Reddi-wip and chocolate pudding topped with mini chocolate morsels in a graham cracker crust.
ingredients: 1 (5.9 ounce) package chocolate instant pudding mix
1 (6.5 ounce) can Reddi-wip® Original Dairy Whipped Topping
½ cup miniature semi-sweet chocolate morsels
1 tablespoon Additional Reddi-wip Original Whipped Light Cream and crushed candy
directions: Add dry pudding mix; beat with wire whisk until well blended and mixture just begins to thicken
Stir in chocolate morsels, if desired
Add contents of Reddi-wip can; stir gently but quickly until well blended
Garnish with additional Reddi-wip and crushed candy, if desired
